LanguageData.RK_MagicWand.label: Ratkin magic wand
LanguageData.RK_MagicWand.description: An highly-potent magic wand capable of opening locked doors and burning furniture to ashes. While no sane Ratkin would dare to use it, a few Ratkins of questionable mental stability have been observed wielding them...
LanguageData.RK_MagicWand.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.RK_MagicWand.tools.1.label: handle
